# setup

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```

# test plot

```{r}
library(ggplot2)

mydata<-data.frame(x=1:10, y=1:10)

ggplot(mydata, aes(x, y))+
  geom_point(colour = "deeppink")+
  theme_minimal()
```
